application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Seattle, WA, USA; Mountain View, CA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA
description:
Cloud Advocates are Google Cloud Platform (GCP) experts who are passionate representatives of our technologies to our communities and vocal proponent of those communities back within Google. Our goal is to increase awareness, mindshare, and adoption of GCP. Advocates accomplish this by creating impactful and relevant content (blogs, presentations, demos, etc) and engaging with communities (developers, people doing data science, etc) online or at events. To drive feedback back into the product teams and improve our offerings, Advocates work closely with Product Managers and Software Engineering teams. In this way, Advocates help drive strategy around Developer Relations.

You’ll help developers and architects understand how Google’s products can be used individually and together to support a wide range of legacy and “born in the cloud” workloads in a variety of enterprise and consumer areas within the domain of data science and data analytics. The mission of this role is to both advocate for and to demonstrate how to build real world data science and data analytics workflows involving use cases and scenarios including: data processing, data warehousing, data exploration, data analysis, feature analysis, model development, model serving, and pipeline orchestration.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of software engineering or development experience, with coding experience in Java, Python and/or R, or experience working with SQL.
  • Experience working with data analytics and/or data science technologies with on-premise and/or cloud technologies data.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience working directly with customers, partners or third party developers, and advocating or mentoring for new and existing technologies and programming languages.
  • Experience within one or more of the following verticals: retailing, media and entertainment, sports, gaming, financial services and/or higher education.
responsibilities:
• Identify opportunities of adoption for Google Cloud technologies within specified verticals in the use case domain of data analytics and data science.
  • Create plans and initiatives that create momentum and lead the success of Google Cloud Platform through your knowledge of, and interactions with key third-party technical communities and key customers.
  • Consult on and advocate during customer adoption engagements to ensure optimal execution of the opportunity e.g. strategy ideation, POC development, production implementation.
  • Advocate for developer communities internally, and influence Google Cloud product strategy and craft narratives around new products and features by working with cross-functional teams.
  • Build and foster an external ‘community ecosystem’ of influencers, meetups, experts that amplify our messages and extend our reach.
title: Developer Advocate, Data Science and Analytics
